body:
As a gamer since the age of 3, I want to hear what your favorite characters are!

Mine would probably be Link (Legend of Zelda) and Pikachu (Pokemon)
I'm a long time Nintendo fan if you couldn't tell :3

Besides Nintendo, Ratchet (Ratchet and Clank,) Sniper (TF2,) Shadow (Sonic the Hedgehog,) etc. etc. etc.

title: Favorite Gaming Characters?

replies.body:
I tend to like characters if they have interesting backstories, have amazing character development, or are just great comic relief. That's just me, I don't really tend to choose favorites for no reason other than those (or nostalgia >.>).

Your Partner (Pokemon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time / Darkness / Sky)
Chatot, Loudred (also from PMD: EoTDS)
Feraligatr (Pokemon, first starter ever. :D)
Floatzel (Pokemon)
Captain Qwark (Ratchet and Clank)
Daxter (Jak and Daxter)
Garen, Varus (League of Legends, these entries will probably change...)
Wheatley (Portal)
Fawful (Mario and Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story)
Antasma (M&L: Dream Team)

replies.body:
"portal sucks"...
Portal sucks.......
*turns unstable*
PORTAL SUCKS?!? :D
*commences crazy laughter*

I can't believe you would say that, though D:

My favorite character would be Samus, by the way :3
